name: Moon Wars V.69.42.06.94.20
description:
Controls

WAD

E To Shoot

Climb your way to stage 5 to win!

Lose if you die 5 times

Shoot Em Enemies Up!

Creators- David Albay and a bit of help from Paul Omamos

SFX- https://sfxr.me/

Music- https://www.melodyloops.com/

Long presses don't work on any weapons

Sadly this is not available for any other operating systems other than windows this will be fixed soon

Feel free to change the icon of the folder to make it more appealing/to make it look an actual app, to do this select the image that you want the folder to look like then go to https://www.icoconverter.com/ to turn it into an icon after you do this right click the folder the select properties go to customize then click change icon then select the image that you turned into an icon afterwards go back to your desktop then right click the folder again then click create shortcut this will create the shortcut that will lead you to the folder make sure to not delete the folder or else nothing will work
